item.description: Github Prebuilt Binaries The easiest and best way to get Hilbish is directly from Github. For official stable releases, check out the latest Github release. Linux Repositories Hilbish is packaged in a few repositories for some distros. Arch Linux (AUR) Hilbihs is on the AUR. Setup an AUR helper, and install. Example with yay: yay -S hilbish Or, from master branch: yay -S hilbish-git Alpine Linux Hilbish is currentlty in the testing/edge repository for Alpine.
